definitions.body: old Canaanit. city, [[עַי]] alw. c. art. [[הָעַי]] ([[הָעָָי]] Ge 13:3 +), near Bethel to the SE. (exact site unknown, cf. Di:Jos 7:2 Buhl:Geogr. 177), Ge 12:8 (J), Ge 13:3 (J), Jos 7:2, Jos 7:2, Jos 7:3, Jos 7:4, Jos 7:5, Jos 8:1, Jos 8:1, Jos 8:2, Jos 8:3 + 18 t. Jos 8 (+ Qr v:Jos 8:12, v:Jos 8:16, but improb., Kt [[עיר]], cf. Di), Jos 9:3, Jos 10:1, Jos 10:1, Jos 10:2 (all JE), Jos 12:9 (D), Ezr 2:28 = Ne 7:32; = [[עַיׇּת]] Is 10:28; [[עַיׇּה]] (so Baer Ginsb, > [[עַיׇּא]] van d. H.) Ne 11:31, so rd. also (for [[עַזׇּה]] q. v. ad fin.) 1Ch 7:28.
E. Jordan city Je 49:3 (+ [[חֶשְׁבוֹן]]), but rd. [[עָר]] city (?) Gf Rothst:Kau Co ([[הָעִיר]] ?).
